name: 3d Engineers
description: 3d Engineers is a sandbox game/tool in engineering and construction.
minimum_requirements: OS: windows xp Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 512 MB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 210 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: windows 7 Processor: dual cpu 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Once you understood the controls and 3d interface this is a great sandbox engineering experience! A great, very unique pc game. After playing through the 3d Bridges part, you will know a lot more about building.
